entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gravenhurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:52 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
